item.title: Welcome!
item.dc:creator: John T. Foster
item.description: Welcome to the course webpage for PGE 334 - Reservoir Geomechanics taught in the Petroleum and Geosystems Engineering Department at The University of Texas at Austin. The course syllabus is available at here and on the navigation bar at the top of the page as well. Soon, there will be assignments posted here as well as additional reference material for the class. Please check this page frequently.
